intro.description: This cheat sheet walks you through creating a new Camel project using Spring and ActiveMQ

item.title: Open the Java Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Java in the menubar at the top of the workbench. This step changes the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for Java development.

item.title: Open the New Fuse IDE Project wizard
item.description: To start creating a new project you need to open the wizard to be able to create a new project
